name: Chaoffice
description:
!!!READ BEFORE PLAYING!!!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Left CTRL to sprint (you can't shoot while sprinting)

Left mouse to shoot

--------------------------------------------------------

You are an office shooter who doesn't want to kill anyone. Your goal is to cause chaos in an office to make headlines and become famous. 

Shoot as close as you can to the employees without hitting them to gain popularity.

 Watch out of the armed employees that will run after you and try to kill you. After using all your ammo, return to the elevator to make a successful escape.

--------------------------------------------------------

Created by: Brandon, Shimon
